dcterms:description: AI2-THOR is an interactive 3D environment designed for visual AI research, featuring 125 different object categories across 120 indoor scenes, allowing for object detection tasks in a simulated environment.
dcterms:title: AI2-THOR

dcterms:creator: Agrim Gupta
Piotr Dollar
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: LVIS is a dataset for large vocabulary instance segmentation, providing a rich set of object categories and annotations for training and evaluating object detection models.
dcterms:title: LVIS

dcterms:creator: Manolis Savva
Abhishek Kadian

dcterms:description: Habitat is a platform for embodied AI research, providing a suite of environments and tasks for training and evaluating AI agents in simulated 3D spaces.
dcterms:title: Habitat

dcterms:creator: Eric Kolve
Roozbeh Mottaghi
Winson Han
Eli VanderBilt
Luca Weihs
Alvaro Herrasti

Yuke Zhu

dcterms:description: AI2-iTHOR is an interactive 3D environment for visual AI, similar to AI2-THOR, used for training and evaluating object detection models in a simulated setting.
dcterms:title: AI2-iTHOR
